title: Northern Messenger - Story Paper 1940-1941
description:
Here's an entertaining bit of Canadian history preserved in digital form. The Northern Messenger was (at this point in its history) a non-denominational Christian children's story paper, published weekly. Despite the Christian aspect of the story paper, it has some good stories and interesting advertising, editorials and news articles from a time when Canada had just entered WWII.

This torrent contains 58 weekly issues of this story paper from 1940 (47 issues) and 1941 (11 issues) scanned in hi-res colour.
